name: Time Loop (itch)
description:
#BrackeysGameJam

You're stuck in a time loop. 

Can you break the loop ? Or you'll cause a paradox?

Be ready to get surprised over and over again!

Jump and avoid the obstacles and lies that lie further!

Hey there is a binary code in the game can you find it?

There is also another hint. See for yourself!

Play in full screen mode.

Controls

Use A and D (or the arrow keys) to move around.

Use W (or Space) to jump.
